Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 65th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Benjamin Berg (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/1/2015, off Scott McDaniel (STL)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,035,714 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2016, hitting .522 with 0 HR, 1 RBI...
10/20/2016: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $11,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Montreal on 5/22/2017...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2017, hitting .366 with 0 HR, 17 RBI...
Injured on 6/14/2017 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/30/2018 with a Torn Hamstring Muscle, out for full season...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2019, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2019, hitting .708 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 2/1/2020 (Going to BRO: 1B Pedro Sol, P Maels Tomas, P Randall Joseph. Going to CIN: LF Andre Winston, 2B Steven Mora, P Richard Thomas, P Zachary Pietrzak).
